text: WNBI-LP (107.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of New Buffalo, Michigan. The station is owned by New Buffalo Area Schools, and airs a variety format. The station was assigned the WNBI-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on September 7, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FCC Public Inspection File for WNBI-LP * NBI-LP NBI-LP Category:High school radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Michigan Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Berrien County, Michigan
title: WNBI-LP
